85 At astatine
use 	890(40)
WEL 	920
CRC
talk 	Finkelnburg, W.; Humbach, W. (1955). "Ionisierungsenergien von Atomen und Atomionen." Naturwiss. 42:35. give 890±40 kJ/mol. The Gmelin handbook gives a number of references for predictions of the 1st ionization energy, around 9.4 eV. (907 kJ/mol)
